AI System Design.content: Logs need to be brief, but elaborate on key concepts to facilitate better RAG training.
Will be using ChatGPT to ensure quality of ingested entries for RAG system is high.
Will need approximately 100-200 entries for RAG to ensure high quality summaries with minimal corrections
Will need some initial entries for each subcategory, around 3, to ensure the model can use more context, and improve early accuracy.
Planned local Ollama inference pipeline to minimize external API dependency.
Designed prompt templates optimized for efficient RAG summarization.
Evaluated fine-tuning vs. RAG; chose RAG for faster context adaptation.

Execution Strategy.content: Instead of migrating existing validated knowledge from the AI Assistant Database to the Ideas Logger, maintain the database as the structured, finalized knowledge base. Keep the Ideas Logger for rapid, spontaneous ideation and early-stage concepts. Only transition ideas from the Logger into the AI Assistant Database after they've been reviewed, refined, and validated. This ensures clear workflow separation, optimizes the ideation-to-execution pipeline, and preserves database integrity.
Will need to carefully update database assistant will use in order to ensure safety and data integrity.

Visual or Audio Prompt.content: Identified SDXL and MeinaMix models for optimized romance and world-building visuals.
Configured local Stable Diffusion WebUI integration for AI-driven visual storytelling.
Will design visual tagging schema for easier retrieval and scene integration.
DreamShaper XL is optimized for balanced narrative visuals combining realism with slight artistic stylization.
Juggernaut XL excels in detailed photorealistic visuals, suitable for cinematic world-building and high-fidelity character art.
MeinaMix V12 Final specializes in nuanced character-driven romantic and intimate scenes, maintaining accuracy and consistency.
Realistic Vision V6 is ideal for lifelike portraits and scenes requiring photographic realism.
RevAnimated V2 Rebirth generates dynamic, anime-inspired stylized visuals, perfect for expressive narrative storytelling.
SDXL 1.0 serves as the baseline model for structured and coherent detailed environment generation.
V1-5-pruned-emaonly is efficient for rapid concept prototyping and quick iterative visual generation.
